alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 5:01PM CDT until May 07 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Nokomis, moving southeast at 20 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR NORTHEAST MONTGOMERY COUNTY, ILLINOIS. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...At 456 PM, trained weather spotters reported baseball sized hail six miles northwest of Witt, Illinois. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Ohlman and Wenonah. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
